T02TD2272E:117a-1: k'a ya b'ak tsitta aa ma na si ka ra n'a ma /
T02TD2272E:117a-3: sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2272E:117a-4: mtshan ma rab tu mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2272E:117a-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2272E:117a-6: gang zhig sku yi khyad par bdud bzhi rab tu 'joms mdzad cing //
T02TD2272E:117a-7: rnal 'byor rnam par grol bas mdzad pa gang gis ni //
T02TD2272E:117a-8: 'dod pa'i don ni yang dag sbyin par gang 'gyur ba //
T02TD2272E:117a-9: 'gro la byams pa'i cha lugs mchog gi don ston pa //
T02TD2272E:117a-10: don dam rab tu mi gnas dgongs pa rgyal ba'i thugs //
T02TD2272E:117a-11: gang gi sems la 'di kun bsam du med do kye //
T02TD2272E:117a-12: khyod ni phrin las yan lag mang po ston mdzad cing //
T02TD2272E:117a-13: dgyes shing nam mkha'i khams kun thams cad 'gengs par byed //
T02TD2272E:117a-14: gsung mchog yan lag drug cu sgra skad sna tshogs sgrogs //
T02TD2272E:117a-15: thugs kyi khyad par dgongs pa dbyings las mi bskyod kyang//
T02TD2272E:117a-16: thams cad tshim zhing mgu nas rab tu bstod par byed //
T02TD2272E:117a-17: byams dang snying rje'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar ston //
T02TD2272E:117a-18: ma h'a de ba au ma de ba rab tu 'joms par byed //
T02TD2272E:117a-19: phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de //
T02TD2272E:117a-20: thar pa'i sgo ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi lam 'di nyid //
T02TD2272E:117a-21: gang yang gtso mchog ldan pa'i sbyor ba dag gis rab tu mi dbye bar //
T02TD2272E:117a-22: rnal 'byor chen po tha mi dad pa yin //
T02TD2272E:117a-23: gang gis de ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2272E:117a-24: dri ma'i tshul gyis gang yang mthong ba med //
T02TD2272E:117a-25: gang gis de kun 'chang bar byed pa de yis ni //
T02TD2272E:117b-0: gzi mdangs @117b gnyis las brten te las kun ston par byed //
T02TD2272E:117b-1: bdag med ro gcig khyab par byed pa'i gzugs ldan ni //
T02TD2272E:117b-2: 'di na mi gnas kun kyang 'gro bar byed //
T02TD2272E:117b-3: sngags dang mdo sde kun gyi rgyal por dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2272E:117b-4: 'di dag kun gyi rtsa ba yid la mi byed par //
T02TD2272E:117b-5: khyed kyis gcig dang gnyis la ma sems kye //
T02TD2272E:117b-6: kun rdzob dran pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs par ston pa //
T02TD2272E:117b-7: don dam mi dmigs pa yi dbyings su ro gcig nyid //
T02TD2272E:117b-8: dug lnga la sogs nad kyis nyen pa'i mun pa sel //
T02TD2272E:117b-9: thog ma'i mtha' dang tha ma'i dngos gzhi ma mthong bar //
T02TD2272E:117b-10: 'dus ma byas la yid kyi dmigs su med do kye //
T02TD2272E:117b-11: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bar na ming dang bral 'dug pa //
T02TD2272E:117b-12: yan lag log na gcig gi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2272E:117b-13: shes par bya dang bya'o cog gi tha snyad kun //
T02TD2272E:117b-14: 'di las gzhan du lta ba mtshan mas myong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:117b-15: sgra gcan zin gyis zla bzos pa ji bzhin te //
T02TD2272E:117b-16: ma mthong ba nyid byis dang bar nas shor bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:117b-17: yengs dang gnas pa'i bar na ngo bo 'di zhes med //
T02TD2272E:117b-18: rgyu med rkyen bral skye ba med pa gnyis bar na //
T02TD2272E:117b-19: log par lta ba'i tshogs kyis 'di la gzhol du med //
T02TD2272E:117b-20: gi wang gur gum tsandan thig le bris pa bzhin //
T02TD2272E:117b-21: zla ba bzang po rgyu skar 'od kyis 'gebs pa nyid //
T02TD2272E:117b-22: snying po'i 'od kyis yan lag zil gyis gnon par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:117b-23: 'di nas 'di ru zad ces 'di byung ba rtag dka' nyid //
T02TD2272E:117b-24: gang gis nam mkha' dag la longs spyod pa'i //
T02TD2272E:117b-25: 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di la 'phel 'grib med par 'byung //
T02TD2272E:117b-26: gang zhig nor bu dri ma med pa 'chang ba yi //
T02TD2272E:117b-27: sems kyi yon tan gter chen 'di las 'byung 'gyur te //
T02TD2272E:117b-28: mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu blta ba nyid //
T02TD2272E:117b-29: chos nyid mtshon pa'i ngo bo 'di zhes 'das 'gyur ba //
T02TD2272E:117b-30: blo mchog rnams kyis kyang ni phigs par nus ma yin //
T02TD2272E:117b-31: gnyis med tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs gang nyid //
T02TD2272E:117b-32: 'di nas song ba gang yang med par shes pa de //
T02TD2272E:117b-33: 'di ni mi gnas gang na'ang gnas pa med //
T02TD2272E:117b-34: yul med 'di la rtag tu lta ba dang bral nyid //
T02TD2272E:118a-0: 'di nas gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs mtshams @118a * //
T02TD2272E:118a-2: 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra yis ma khyer bar //
T02TD2272E:118a-3: ci bde ba dang lhan cig dag tu byos //
T02TD2272E:118a-4: kye ho grogs dag 'di la sems gnyis yod de med kyi brtag pa kun //
T02TD2272E:118a-5: rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod de smyon pa'i tshig tu 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:118a-6: smyo bar gyur nas rgya mtsho lhung ba nyid //
T02TD2272E:118a-7: tshangs pa rdul dang mtshan ma'i mun pa dag dang ma bral ba //
T02TD2272E:118a-8: de nyid gnyis bral rtogs par 'dod pa dang //
T02TD2272E:118a-9: rgya mtsho sa dang gshag mar nor bu 'gyur mthong nyid //
T02TD2272E:118a-10: brtul zhugs mya ngan 'da' ba'i spyod pa gang byed pa //
T02TD2272E:118a-11: 'di ni mi shes de 'drar ston par byed ;
T02TD2272E:118a-12: / bden pa gnyis bral sgro skur med pa'i gnyug ma gang //
T02TD2272E:118a-13: gang du mthong ba med pa de yin te //
T02TD2272E:118a-14: nges par grub cing 'di la rang bzhin med par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:118a-15: gang gis ma mthong ba las de ni rgyal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:118a-16: theg pa gsum gyis mya ngan 'das ston pa //
T02TD2272E:118a-17: 'di ru ma shes de nyid mthong ba med //
T02TD2272E:118a-18: rnam grol lam ston bye brag gang du'ang phye ba med pa de //
T02TD2272E:118a-19: byis pa rnams kyis shes par 'gyur ma yin //
T02TD2272E:118a-20: gang zhig 'dod chags bral ba rtogs par 'dod pa de //
T02TD2272E:118a-21: sdug bsngal gsum mam brgyad la sogs pa kun spangs nyid //
T02TD2272E:118a-22: bden pa gnyis las mi 'da' thabs tshul sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD2272E:118a-23: 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'od zer g-yas g-yon rab tu 'gyed //
T02TD2272E:118a-24: bum ril kha sbub ma dag pa nyid dag ston pa //
T02TD2272E:118a-25: tshang tshing 'brel ba'i yul drug la sogs rab tu 'joms //
T02TD2272E:118a-26: thams cad mkhyen ldan sus kyang mthong ba med pa de ;
T02TD2272E:118a-27: ; grags pa la sogs kun gyis bstod dang bskyod pa med //
T02TD2272E:118a-28: kye ho 'di ltar gnas na kun gyis shes 'gyur te //
T02TD2272E:118a-29: thog mtha' med nas srid pa'i rgya mtsho g-yengs 'gyur ba //
T02TD2272E:118a-30: sdug bsngal nyid kyi rtsa ba 'di ru byas //
T02TD2272E:118a-31: 'di la shes dang nyon mongs la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2272E:118a-32: dri mas ma gos 'dam gyi padma bzhin //
T02TD2272E:118a-33: kha dog ma 'dres yul la so sor snang //
T02TD2272E:118a-34: sgyu mar rtogs tsam gar mkhan mig 'phrul bzhin //
T02TD2272E:118a-35: 'du byed sna tshogs gang la bsags pa de //
T02TD2272E:118a-36: glo bur rten 'brel dag las goms pa'i stobs //
T02TD2272E:118b-0: 'di goms gang yang shes par mi @118b 'gyur te //
T02TD2272E:118b-1: ma goms pas na thams cad shes par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:118b-2: 'dres pa'i chos ni gang yang gnas par mi byed do //
T02TD2272E:118b-3: sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya la sogs rim pa kun //
T02TD2272E:118b-4: 'di la skad cig tsam du rtogs par ma byed cig /'jig rten bstan bcos dag dang glags bam gyis ;
T02TD2272E:118b-5: / gsung gi bdag nyid brjod par bya ba min //
T02TD2272E:118b-6: nyi ma zla ba gnyis su gnas 'gyur ba //
T02TD2272E:118b-7: de dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas ni //
T02TD2272E:118b-8: gang gis gang spyod de yis rab tu brgyan //
T02TD2272E:118b-9: skye ba med pa'i rnam par nges brjod pa'i //
T02TD2272E:118b-10: dbus su brjod pas mtha' rnams rab tu spangs //
T02TD2272E:118b-11: ji ltar bstan pas go bar mi 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2272E:118b-12: 'jig rten khams su gtan 'khyams rigs chad de //
T02TD2272E:118b-13: bag chags las kyis mnar ba ma tshor bas //
T02TD2272E:118b-14: chos nyid dri ma med pa'i don mi mthong //
T02TD2272E:118b-15: gang yang 'di dang bral ba med pa de //
T02TD2272E:118b-16: dran 'dzin lus las myur du skad cig grol //
T02TD2272E:118b-17: rdo rje'i sems ni yongs su brtag dka' ba //
T02TD2272E:118b-18: sems la sems su ma mthong ro snyoms nas //
T02TD2272E:118b-19: phyi nang bsam gtan rtse mos brtags pas stong //
T02TD2272E:118b-20: rnal ma'i don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ni //
T02TD2272E:118b-21: ye shes shes rab gsang ba'i dbyings la rdzogs //
T02TD2272E:118b-22: rang gis ma mthong mtshan nyid kun ldan pa //
T02TD2272E:118b-23: zhas ni bsngags pa brjod 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2272E:118b-24: dran med mnyam pa'i dbyings la skur gsal mos pa med par spyod //
T02TD2272E:118b-25: thugs rjes mi gzigs sku gsung thugs kyis ma gos pa //
T02TD2272E:118b-26: gnyis su ma mthong gsum gyi dri ma bral //
T02TD2272E:118b-27: sna tshogs par snang gang la ngos gzung med pa ste //
T02TD2272E:118b-28: lus ngag yid gsum 'bad pa'i rtsol bas gdung bar ma byed cig / ngas ni rdo rje'i glu dang long gtam rgyob sod dang //
T02TD2272E:118b-29: 'gro ba kun gyis shes pa dag dang gar bder spyod //
T02TD2272E:118b-30: mi sgrim mi lta mi spyod 'di dang 'bral ma myong //
T02TD2272E:118b-31: ye nas ma bcos thams cad 'byung 'jug go 'phang yang //
T02TD2272E:118b-32: kye ho sna tshogs gang yang rung ba 'di la bsam pa'i sems bral bas //
T02TD2272E:118b-33: yid kyi rtog pa sna tshogs 'di ni dran pa'i sems yin te //
T02TD2272E:118b-34: gang yang gzugs dang rtsa ba med pa dag las skyes pa yin //
T02TD2272E:119a-0: tha mal shes pa ma bzung bde chen rgyal po @119a * //
T02TD2272E:119a-2: / mtshan nyid cir yang ma mthong phyogs cha kun dang bral //
T02TD2272E:119a-3: 'khrul pas brtags pa'i bsam brjod 'di ni glo bur te //
T02TD2272E:119a-4: blo las byung phyir blo yis bsgom du ga la yod //
T02TD2272E:119a-5: gang la yan lag med pa de nyid kun gyi khyim du ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:119a-6: go ba'i tshe na ci yang med pa ste //
T02TD2272E:119a-7: dngos kun ci yang gsal ba mthong ba med //
T02TD2272E:119a-8: gang la mya ngan 'das dang srid pa kha sbyor ba //
T02TD2272E:119a-9: gnyis su snang ba khyod la rten dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2272E:119a-10: rgyal ba la sogs kun du sprul pa sna tshogs ston mdzad pa //
T02TD2272E:119a-11: dag pa'i rigs rnams kun la khyod kyis spyod //
T02TD2272E:119a-12: mi bsam thugs rje rang 'byung sprul pa ni //
T02TD2272E:119a-13: nor bu rin chen lta bur 'phel 'grib med par 'byung //
T02TD2272E:119a-14: dngos po med pas nams kyang rtogs min pas //
T02TD2272E:119a-15: btang gzhag med cing rang bzhin rnam par grol //
T02TD2272E:119a-16: 'dzin med yid la bya med rnal 'byor bsam gtan nyid //
T02TD2272E:119a-17: gang la mi bsgom gang du'ang btsal ba med pa de //
T02TD2272E:119a-18: bsam du med pas yid la mi byed ro snyoms kye //
T02TD2272E:119a-19: ye shes mkha' 'dra bsam bral ma bcos snying po'i don //
T02TD2272E:119a-20: 'di la blo yis bsam zhing brjod du med do kye //
T02TD2272E:119a-21: ye btang rang yan tshogs drug lhug pa'i spyod pa 'di //
T02TD2272E:119a-22: tshogs drug rjes su sbyor ba'i mkhas pas btang gzhag med //
T02TD2272E:119a-23: kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor lhag pa'i bsam bral bas ;
T02TD2272E:119a-24: ; de bzhin nyid la mi gnas gang la rang bzhin med par grol //
T02TD2272E:119a-25: 'od gsal rdzogs dang thim dang 'gags par 'gyur ba gang //
T02TD2272E:119a-26: ji ltar bsgoms dang chags par 'gyur pa mtshan ma ste //
T02TD2272E:119a-27: phung po khams dang skye mched yan lag thams cad kun //
T02TD2272E:119a-28: gcig gi dbyings na mi mngon phra ba'i tshul du gnas//
T02TD2272E:119a-29: rgya mtsho'i dbyings nas nor bu rin chen rnyed 'gyur ba //
T02TD2272E:119a-30: chu srin dung dang gdug pa can gyis mthong mi 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:119a-31: phrag dog srid pa'i nyon mongs la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2272E:119a-32: mtshan ma'i dbyings nas ngos bzung med par mthong //
T02TD2272E:119a-33: gsum la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug par byed pa ni //
T02TD2272E:119a-34: rnam rig bden pa gnyis kyi sgo nas rtsol bar byed //
T02TD2272E:119a-35: ji ltar snang bzhin 'jig rten tha snyad lam //
T02TD2272E:119a-36: rnam thar sgo gsum bslab pa rnam pa gsum //
T02TD2272E:119a-37: mtshan mo'i yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor te //
T02TD2272E:119a-38: rnal 'byor chen po 'di la gnas mi byed //
T02TD2272E:119a-39: gang zhig shel sgong dag pa lta bur ni //
T02TD2272E:119a-40: dri ma gnyis bral srid dang 'das grol te //
T02TD2272E:119b-0: rin @119b po cha ltar dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung //
T02TD2272E:119b-1: yongs su zad pa zad phyir mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2272E:119b-2: dngos med bden pa gnyis bral gcig gi dngos po stong //
T02TD2272E:119b-3: mtshan ma thams cad ye nas med pa'i phyir //
T02TD2272E:119b-4: mthong thos la sogs mtha' yi rtog pa med //
T02TD2272E:119b-5: med la med par 'dzin pa tha snyad de //
T02TD2272E:119b-6: 'di ni tshor bar nus pa ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:119b-7: 'di ni rtsa ba kun gyi rjes su rtog par ma byed cig /'di la gang tshe rtog par byed pa dang //
T02TD2272E:119b-8: bskal par bgrangs kyang de nyid rnyed pa min //
T02TD2272E:119b-9: mgal me gtsub shing lta bur me mched 'bar ba bzhin //
T02TD2272E:119b-10: 'di kun mched nas thams cad sreg par byed //
T02TD2272E:119b-11: kye ho grogs dag rgya mtsho nor bu lta bu'i sems ni 'di nyid yin te kye //
T02TD2272E:119b-12: ma he rva rur seng ge'i 'o ma gang blugs pa //
T02TD2272E:119b-13: nor bu rin chen 'bar ba de yis thob bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:119b-14: nyon mongs pa rnams nyi mas rab tu skams pa'i 'od zer 'di //
T02TD2272E:119b-15: ngan 'gro la sogs log par lta bas 'jigs pa med pa de //
T02TD2272E:119b-16: gang dag rnyed pa de dag gzhal gyis mi lang ngo //
T02TD2272E:119b-17: ji ltar chos kyi dbyings su snang ba de srid du //
T02TD2272E:119b-18: zag pa med gang thams cad de yis spyad pa yin //
T02TD2272E:119b-19: dug sbrul phag rgod glang chen seng ges zos pa bzhin //
T02TD2272E:119b-20: de bzhin srid dang mya ngan 'das pa khyur mi 'das //
T02TD2272E:119b-21: bskal pa brjod du med pa brgya stong du ma ru //
T02TD2272E:119b-22: nyon mongs la sogs bsags pa'i sa bon ni //
T02TD2272E:119b-23: sems gcig snang bar 'gyur bas 'bras bu gcig tu log par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:119b-24: sgron me khang bur nor bu gnas gyur pa'i //
T02TD2272E:119b-25: 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:119b-26: dman pa'i lta spyod nyan thos la sogs pa'i //
T02TD2272E:119b-27: sems de yang dag blangs nas 'jug par gyur pa de //
T02TD2272E:119b-28: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dka' bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:119b-29: sems kyi skad cig 'di la mtha' yas mu med de //
T02TD2272E:119b-30: yan lag thams cad skad cig 'di la log par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:119b-31: chos rnams thams cad kho na nyid la rdzogs par 'gyur ba yi ;
T02TD2272E:119b-32: / gzhan med gang zhig gang nas 'ongs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:119b-33: zla ba'i snying po mun pa'i g-yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ba gang //
T02TD2272E:119b-34: 'jig rten rmi lam lta bu 'di la yang dag rnyed par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:119b-35: brdzun pa gang yin 'di la yang dag sus mthong ba //
T02TD2272E:120a-0: bltar med de la gzugs su mthong bar @120a * //
T02TD2272E:120a-2: don dam par ni gang yang yod par 'gyur ba ma yin na //
T02TD2272E:120a-3: pha rol gzhan du mthong nas 'gro bar 'dod pa'i gang zag de //
T02TD2272E:120a-4: 'di las gzhan du 'gro ba'i khyad par bse dri can bzhin no //
T02TD2272E:120a-5: 'di ni pha rol brtol bas gang du ma bor bar //
T02TD2272E:120a-6: gcig kyang phyin pa med par 'dis brtol lo //
T02TD2272E:120a-7: kye ho gang 'di tha snyad lam 'dis btsal ma yin //
T02TD2272E:120a-8: thar pa rtag tu byi la lta bu'i mchongs pas nags su ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120a-9: gal te stag dang wa mo lta bu'i stobs ni go bzlog na //
T02TD2272E:120a-10: de nyid yod pas de la ci zhig phan par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2272E:120a-11: de nyid shes na mi bsam mi rtog par //
T02TD2272E:120a-12: gzugs mthong cir yang snang ba'i yul ni de ru stong par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120a-13: 'di la yengs nas de la gnas par 'gyur ba ma tshor ro //
T02TD2272E:120a-14: dran dang shes bzhin gnyis ni bar gyi de la gang yang ma mthong ste //
T02TD2272E:120a-15: chos kun stor na 'di yi khong nas gnas par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2272E:120a-16: 'di la dngos po med cing bsam du med pa de //
T02TD2272E:120a-17: khyod kyis rtsva mchog tsam du gnyis ka med par byos //
T02TD2272E:120a-18: kye ho sangs rgyas kun gyi yan lag bzhi pa 'di kun gsum du ston par ni //
T02TD2272E:120a-19: khyod kyis yang nas yang du bsams pas mthong ba gang yang med mod kye //
T02TD2272E:120a-20: 'khor ba'i dran pas rten 'brel dag las 'byung ba ni //
T02TD2272E:120a-21: sna tshogs bar snang rang gi ngo bo ma skyes phyir //
T02TD2272E:120a-22: mi 'gyur bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dag dang lhan cig skyes //
T02TD2272E:120a-23: sems kyi don dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2272E:120a-24: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i yon tan nyid //
T02TD2272E:120a-25: chos rnams thams cad gnyis su gdod nas ma byung ste //
T02TD2272E:120a-26: gnyis dang gcig gi dran pas du ma dag dang 'bral bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120a-27: gang yang brjod par bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig rang gis stong pa ste //
T02TD2272E:120a-28: blo las 'das phyir mtshan ma rab tu 'joms //
T02TD2272E:120a-29: de med pa de gang yin gang na gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2272E:120a-30: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan gang tshe thob par 'gyur ba la //
T02TD2272E:120a-31: bral bas 'di las gzhan du song bas ma mthong ngo //
T02TD2272E:120a-32: gsang sngags 'di kun rtsab de las bskyed par ni //
T02TD2272E:120a-33: de med pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yang yod pa ma yin kye //
T02TD2272E:120a-34: su zhig 'di la rtog par byed pa'i blun po de //
T02TD2272E:120a-35: bskal pa brgyar yang mchog gi don mi mthong //
T02TD2272E:120b-0: gang zhig yid la @120b byed pa'i mtshan mas brgyal ba kun //
T02TD2272E:120b-1: btang gzhag bral dang thob par mi 'gyur rgyal srid bzhin //
T02TD2272E:120b-2: cung zad drod thob byang chub sems dpa' dag / gang du g-yos pa med pa mtshor ro //
T02TD2272E:120b-3: rnam par rtog can lam du zhugs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2272E:120b-4: byang chub sems kyi thig le rlung la gang bskyon pa //
T02TD2272E:120b-5: sa bon des ni 'khor ba 'di ru zags par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120b-6: yang dag pa yi de nyid thob par mi 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2272E:120b-7: tshang tshing dra ba'i gseb tu 'brel bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120b-8: shes rab mig gis log par tshar bcad na //
T02TD2272E:120b-9: gzhan gyi log par lta ba rang gi de ru grol //
T02TD2272E:120b-10: dka' thub la sogs gzhan du 'bad pa med //
T02TD2272E:120b-11: bdag med par ni rang byung gang yang rnam pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02TD2272E:120b-12: rgyu rkyen la sogs 'brel pa 'di ru stong par byos //
T02TD2272E:120b-13: rnal 'byor 'di la bdag gi gnas su 'dug ba ma mthong ngo //
T02TD2272E:120b-14: sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i long ba gang 'chal 'dis //
T02TD2272E:120b-15: srid pa'i dra ba khur nas rgya mtshor mchong bar byed //
T02TD2272E:120b-16: de la gru med rgya mtsho'i zabs su zag par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120b-17: thog mtha' med pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'di //
T02TD2272E:120b-18: srid dang mya ngan 'das grol nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120b-19: de la sems rgyun 'chad do snyam du sems shing stong par yid la ma byed cig / gang la don gyi brtul zhugs chen po 'di nyid ma thob par //
T02TD2272E:120b-20: brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dbang gis de la ma reg kye //
T02TD2272E:120b-21: byin gyis brlabs dang brlab bya med pas ngo mtshar che ba nyid //
T02TD2272E:120b-22: gnyis med sgro skur bral ba 'di la gnas pa gang //
T02TD2272E:120b-23: rten dang bral ba'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120b-24: 'gro ba kun gyis de ltar shes par 'gyur gang ni //
T02TD2272E:120b-25: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa kun gyi don shes 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120b-26: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams rang gi sems yin par //
T02TD2272E:120b-27: gzhan du blta ba med par thag chod bsam med blo 'das nyid //
T02TD2272E:120b-28: de la bsgoms dang ma bsgoms rnam par rtog pa dang //
T02TD2272E:120b-29: mtshan ma dgag dang sbang bar bya ba mi dgos te //
T02TD2272E:120b-30: de la ci bya gang yang ma byas de nyid gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:120b-31: ji ltar rnam rtog ma bkag ma spangs par //
T02TD2272E:120b-32: gzhan du ma mthong de nyid gsal 'gyur na //
T02TD2272E:120b-33: de ni gang la gnas kyang gzhan du mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:121a-0: ma bsgoms ched du ma byas 'bral ba @121a * //
T02TD2272E:121a-2: dus rnams kun du 'di don shes pa'i mtshan ma 'di la rtog par ma byed cig / rang la lhan cig gsal ba'i snang srid 'di la rtog med cing //
T02TD2272E:121a-3: de las gzhan du rtogs pa'i blo can 'dis ni rgya mtsho nang gi nor bu rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:121a-4: gang nas byung zhing gang du gnas pa'i 'dzin pa 'di ni skye ba med 'gyur na //
T02TD2272E:121a-5: rgyun du 'gag pa med pas gzung 'dzin de ma skyes pas ye shes nyid //
T02TD2272E:121a-6: ngo bo de la dri ma ma spangs de nyid ma bsgoms par //
T02TD2272E:121a-7: nags khrod dag na gnas pa'i glang po yan par khye //
T02TD2272E:121a-8: mtshan ma'i yul gyi rnam g-yeng rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas //
T02TD2272E:121a-9: gnod cing de la g-yeng bar mi 'gyur te //
T02TD2272E:121a-10: mtshon cha bral ba'i chom rkun dag gis gsad bcad ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:121a-11: mtshan ma de nyid snying po med 'gyur ba //
T02TD2272E:121a-12: sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad lta bur rang bzhin med par byos //
T02TD2272E:121a-13: gang mthong sems yin de la dngos po med 'gyur bas //
T02TD2272E:121a-14: dran med blo la mi gnas chos rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD2272E:121a-15: de las byung zhing de ru snang nas de nyid 'das 'gyur bas //
T02TD2272E:121a-16: 'di la gzhan du g-yo ba gang yang med pa nyid //
T02TD2272E:121a-17: de la de nyid tsam du mkhyen gyis yid la ma byed kye //
T02TD2272E:121a-18: kye ho grogs dag blo la ci skyes sems de ni //
T02TD2272E:121a-19: dus rnams kun du gsal ba ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:121a-20: de la gsal rgyu ci yang med pa ste //
T02TD2272E:121a-21: brtsad pa kun dang bral bar ni //
T02TD2272E:121a-22: rang gnas pas ni grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:121a-23: ji ltar tshul 'chos byas pa'i sangs rgyas 'di kun ni //
T02TD2272E:121a-24: dge slong ma yin rgya mtsho'i nang du ltung //
T02TD2272E:121a-25: 'di nyid las ni gzhan dag tu ;
T02TD2272E:121a-26: / gcig kyang lta bar mi byed pa //
T02TD2272E:121a-27: des ni thams cad mthong ba'i dge slong yin //
T02TD2272E:121a-28: gang zhig brdzun la goms pa'i gnas brtan des //
T02TD2272E:121a-29: srid pa nyam thag 'di las 'byung bar nus ma yin //
T02TD2272E:121a-30: gang gis srid pa'i chu bo 'di brdzun par //
T02TD2272E:121a-31: shes pa de ni gnas brtan mchog thob 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:121a-32: rnal 'byor de yi spyod yul ni //
T02TD2272E:121a-33: lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i yan lag kun //
T02TD2272E:121a-34: 'di kun shes na dbab tu yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:121a-35: de nyid shes pa de la de kun mthong ba med //
T02TD2272E:121a-36: de ltar 'di las ma gtogs pa'i //
T02TD2272E:121a-37: 'du shes yul gzhan dag las ni //
T02TD2272E:121a-38: skye bar 'gyur ba yod ma yin //
T02TD2272E:121b-0: @121b yul can gang gi phyogs dag tu //
T02TD2272E:121b-1: gnyis su mthong ba med par 'gyur ba da //
T02TD2272E:121b-2: rnam pa sna tshogs de nyid grol ba yin //
T02TD2272E:121b-3: gang zhig phyogs su lta bar gyur pa de //
T02TD2272E:121b-4: mtshan ma'i dran rig pra rags goms pa yin //
T02TD2272E:121b-6: spyod pa ji ltar byas pa kun ;
T02TD2272E:121b-7: / don dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin te //
T02TD2272E:121b-8: nyam thag mtshan mas myur du 'ching bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:121b-9: gang zhig 'di dang phyogs su ni //
T02TD2272E:121b-10: gtad la goms su yod ma yin //
T02TD2272E:121b-11: bsam med yid la goms su med //
T02TD2272E:121b-12: kye ho grogs dag rig pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa ni //
T02TD2272E:121b-13: ye shes bla na med pa'i dbang bskur chen po ste //
T02TD2272E:121b-14: rdzogs ldan dpal ldan bla ma dag gis ni //
T02TD2272E:121b-15: bskur du med pa'i tshul gyis thob par byed pa ni //
T02TD2272E:121b-16: mchog gi rnal 'byor rnams kyis dbang bskur te //
T02TD2272E:121b-17: thob bya med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad rdzogs //
T02TD2272E:121b-18: de nyid ma shes log sred can gyi dbang rnams ne //
T02TD2272E:121b-19: mtshan ma'i rtog pa dag gis gsum du zag par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:121b-20: 'di la nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa las bsags kun //
T02TD2272E:121b-21: shes rab ting 'dzin mi dgos rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:121b-22: khro gnyer med pas zug rngu thams cad 'joms par ni //
T02TD2272E:121b-23: ma skyes pa yi tshul gyis 'dzin par mi byed do //
T02TD2272E:121b-24: snang ba 'gag pa 'di la gsal ba'i rtog pas yid la ma byed cig / phyin ci log dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad ni //
T02TD2272E:121b-25: nyon mongs lnga yi gnas su thams cad zags par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2272E:121b-26: gzhan dag 'di nyid shes bas 'khor ba'i dra ba dag gis stong pa nyid //
T02TD2272E:121b-27: au dum w'a ra lta bur dkon 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD2272E:121b-28: rmongs pa'i mun sel snying po gsang ba'i don //
T02TD2272E:121b-29: sus kyang shes pa med par kun la gsal 'gyur ba //
T02TD2272E:121b-30: snying gar gnas pa'i don la dri ma med 'gyur te //
T02TD2272E:121b-31: brtul zhugs spyod pas gang de mthong ba ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:121b-32: 'di rnams rdzogs la sbyor bar nus pa de //
T02TD2272E:121b-33: yan lag thim nas stong pa nyid du gnas //
T02TD2272E:121b-34: kye ho grogs dag gyad dang rje rigs ji bzhin du //
T02TD2272E:121b-35: gang gis khengs par myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2272E:121b-36: rim par sbyang ba gang yang yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:121b-37: chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du ro gcig dang //
T02TD2272E:122a-1: 'gyur bas thob pa ma yin no //
T02TD2272E:122a-2: gang tshe 'di la rtsa ba med par rtogs pa ni //
T02TD2272E:122a-3: da lta nyid du gnyis med nges par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2272E:122a-4: ji ltar srin bu spyod pas bcings par gang 'gyur ba //
T02TD2272E:122a-5: 'di rnams ro la chags pas 'ching bar 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD2272E:122a-6: tshang tshing 'di la za bar nus pa gang gis ni //
T02TD2272E:122a-7: 'khor lo thams cad rgyun du bskor bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2272E:122a-8: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs gsal ba //
T02TD2272E:122a-9: 'di kun gang gis yid la ma byas par //
T02TD2272E:122a-10: ston pa'i bla ma rdo rje 'dzin la 'dud //
T02TD2272E:122a-11: sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa /
T02TD2272E:122a-12: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2272E:122a-14: // / bla ma nag pos rang 'gyur du gnang ba'o //
T02TD2272E:122a-15: gu ya sa ma pa ta mi thi//
